name: Under Pressure (itch) (Nir Zaid, Romaner811)
description:
UNDER PRESSURE

Joining the Pengu-Kingdom's Royal Guard is every little penguin's dream, But to make that dream come true, You'll have to take the King's Trials: Escape from an underwater maze full of puzzles and shortcuts.

Think you're up for the challenge?  Go ahead and enter the maze, and try not to drown on your way out.

Controls:

- Arrow Keys to Move.

- Space to Interact with objects.

- M to view the maze.

Credits:

Game made by:

Nir Zaid - https://nir-zaid.itch.io

Roman Kuzminsky - https://romaner811.itch.io/

Ido Toov - https://www.idotoov.com/portfolio

for the Matrix Jam.
